_templates.javolution.context

Class ArrayFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • _templates.javolution.context.ArrayFactory

  • public abstract class ArrayFactory
extends java.lang.Object

    This class holds factories to produces arrays of variable length. It allows for object recycling, pre-allocation and stack allocations:[code] // Primitive types. char[] buffer = ArrayFactory.CHARS_FACTORY.array(1024); // Possibly recycled. for (int i = reader.read(buffer, 0, buffer.length); i > 0;) { ... } ArrayFactory.CHARS_FACTORY.recycle(buffer); // // Custom types. static ArrayFactory VERTICES_FACTORY = new ArrayFactory { protected Vertex[] create(int size) { return new Vertex[size]; } }; ... Vertex[] vertices = VERTICES_FACTORY.array(256); [/code]

    Version:
    5.0, May 5, 2007
    Author:
    Jean-Marie Dautelle

        Returns:
        a recycled, pre-allocated or new factory array.
